projects.name: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
projects.shortDescription: Complete redesign of the e-commerce platform with modern UI/UX, improved performance, and mobile-first approach to increase conversion rates.
projects.fullDescription: This comprehensive project involves a complete overhaul of our e-commerce platform. We'll implement a modern design system based on Material Design principles, optimize performance across all devices with lazy loading and code splitting, restructure the product catalog for better navigation and SEO, integrate advanced search with filters and faceted navigation, implement a streamlined checkout process to reduce cart abandonment, and add personalized product recommendations using machine learning. The primary goal is to improve user experience and increase conversion rates by at least 35% while reducing page load times by 50%.

projects.name: Mobile Banking Application
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform mobile banking app with biometric authentication, real-time transactions, bill payments, and comprehensive financial management tools.
projects.fullDescription: Develop a secure, native-quality cross-platform mobile banking application using React Native and TypeScript. The app will include biometric authentication (fingerprint and face recognition), real-time transaction monitoring with push notifications, bill payment functionality with automatic reminders, peer-to-peer money transfers, budget tracking and spending analytics with interactive charts, account management for multiple accounts and cards, deposit check functionality using OCR technology, branch and ATM locator with maps integration, secure messaging with customer support, and comprehensive data encryption following banking industry standards. The application must pass rigorous security audits and comply with financial regulations.

projects.name: Corporate CRM System
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade CRM system with sales pipeline management, customer analytics, automated workflows, and third-party integrations for improved team productivity.
projects.fullDescription: Build a comprehensive Customer Relationship Management system tailored for B2B sales teams. Features include a visual sales pipeline with drag-and-drop functionality, detailed customer profiles with interaction history and communication logs, automated email sequences and follow-up reminders, lead scoring based on engagement and behavior patterns, integration with major email providers (Gmail, Outlook), calendar synchronization for meeting scheduling, customizable reporting dashboards with exportable analytics, team collaboration tools with shared notes and tasks, integration with accounting software for invoice tracking, mobile app for field sales representatives, role-based access control with granular permissions, and API for custom integrations. The system should handle up to 100,000 customer records with sub-second query performance.

projects.name: Educational Learning Platform
projects.shortDescription: Interactive online learning platform with video courses, live classes, progress tracking, certificates, and gamification elements to enhance student engagement.
projects.fullDescription: Create a modern educational platform that supports both self-paced and instructor-led learning. Core features include video course management with chapter organization and progress tracking, live virtual classrooms with video conferencing and screen sharing, interactive quizzes with various question types and instant feedback, assignment submission and grading system with rubrics, discussion forums for student collaboration, private messaging between students and instructors, course certificates with verification codes, gamification elements including badges, points, and leaderboards, personalized learning paths based on student performance, integrated payment gateway for course purchases, comprehensive analytics dashboard for instructors to track student engagement and performance, mobile-responsive design for learning on any device, and accessibility features to support learners with disabilities. The platform should support up to 50,000 concurrent users during peak times.

tasks.name: Design new homepage layout
tasks.description: Create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups for the homepage featuring hero section, featured products, and promotional banners

tasks.name: Implement product listing page
tasks.description: Build responsive product grid with filters, sorting options, and infinite scroll pagination

tasks.name: Optimize images and assets
tasks.description: Compress product images, implement lazy loading, and convert images to WebP format for faster loading

tasks.name: Setup advanced search functionality
tasks.description: Integrate Elasticsearch for fast product search with autocomplete, filters, and typo tolerance

tasks.name: Redesign checkout flow
tasks.description: Create streamlined multi-step checkout with guest checkout option, address validation, and payment method selection

tasks.name: Implement biometric authentication
tasks.description: Add fingerprint and face recognition login using native device APIs with secure fallback to PIN

tasks.name: Build transaction history screen
tasks.description: Create scrollable list of transactions with filters by date, category, and amount with search functionality

tasks.name: Add bill payment module
tasks.description: Implement bill payment feature with saved payees, scheduled payments, and payment history tracking

tasks.name: Create budget tracking dashboard
tasks.description: Build interactive charts showing spending by category with budget limits and alerts for overspending

tasks.name: Implement push notifications
tasks.description: Setup real-time push notifications for transactions, bill reminders, and security alerts

tasks.name: Add check deposit feature
tasks.description: Implement camera-based check deposit with OCR for automatic amount detection and validation

tasks.name: Design sales pipeline interface
tasks.description: Create Kanban-style board for visualizing deal stages with drag-and-drop functionality

tasks.name: Build customer profile pages
tasks.description: Create detailed customer profiles with contact info, interaction timeline, notes, and related deals

tasks.name: Implement email integration
tasks.description: Connect with Gmail and Outlook APIs to sync emails, track opens, and log communications automatically

tasks.name: Create analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Build comprehensive dashboard with sales metrics, conversion rates, and team performance charts

tasks.name: Setup video streaming infrastructure
tasks.description: Configure CDN and video hosting for smooth course video delivery with adaptive bitrate streaming

tasks.name: Build course content management
tasks.description: Create interface for instructors to upload videos, organize chapters, and manage course materials

tasks.name: Implement quiz system
tasks.description: Build quiz builder with multiple question types (multiple choice, true/false, essay) and auto-grading

tasks.name: Add live classroom feature
tasks.description: Integrate video conferencing with WebRTC for live classes with screen sharing and recording

tasks.name: Create student progress tracking
tasks.description: Build system to track video completion, quiz scores, and overall course progress with visual indicators
